about_free:
This software is open source, free and does not come with any warranty whatsoever.
Use at own risk.
about_data_protection:
This software protects your data and privacy to the best of its abilities.
This app stores all necessary data locally on your device.
There is no analytics or advertising software inside.
about_data_declaration: View Privacy and Data Protection Declaration
about_foundation:
This project is supported financially by the Peercoin Foundation.
Please consider donating to the foundation, to further the development of this app.
about_foundation_button: Learn more about the Peercoin Foundation
about_help_or_feedback: Do you need help or want to give feedback?
about_translate: You can help translating this app in the Peercoin Weblate.
about_illustrations: Setup illustrations thanks to the courtesy of
addressbook_dialog_remove_title: Do you really want to remove this address?
addressbook_dialog_addr_unwatch_unable:
$address
can't be unwatched
(has balance or is the next change address)
addressbook_export_dialog_description:
This key gives full access to the coins stored with this address.
Don't share this key with anyone!
Only proceed if you are absolutely sure what you are doing.
app_settings_default_description: The default wallet will open automatically when starting the app.
app_settings_description:
These logs contain sensitive information.
Besides them not containing private keys, be mindful who you might share these logs with.
app_settings_notifications_alert_content:
This will enable our privacy friendly background notifications.
They can be disabled anytime.
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_1:
Sets the interval in which the app will check for new transactions in the background.
Active interval: $minutes minutes.
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_2: Hint: The notifications might be significantly delayed, depending on how or if your operating system throttles background tasks. iOS devices can expect longer intervals.
app_settings_price_alert_content:
This will enable our privacy friendly price data feed.
It can be disabled anytime.
authenticate_retry_warning_text: App will go into locked state and can only be unlocked with successful authentication.
authenticate_retry_warning_title: Warning, you only have one retry left.
buy_peercoin_dialog_title: You will now be forwarded to a third party website.
buy_peercoin_dialog_content: The mainters of this app are not responsible for its content.
import_wif_alert_content:
Please confirm you wish to import the following address:

$address
import_wif_error_failed_parse: Your private key is not valid. Is it in WIF format?
import_wif_error_snack: This address has already been imported
import_wif_hint: The key has to be imported again when restoring the wallet from seed. It is not connected to the seed.
import_wif_intro:
Please enter the private key you wish to import.
It needs to be in WIF format.
jail_dialog_title: You have reached the maximum number of retries.
logout_title: You are about to log out
logout_content:
Are you sure you want to log out?
You need to enter your seed to login again.
no_new_wallet: No new wallets available at this time.
paperwallet_error_1:
Wallet empty 
or amount below minimum output
paperwallet_success:
Paper Wallet imported successfully.
Transaction will appear very soon.
periodic_reminder_donate_body:
This app is developed by the Peercoin Foundation.
Please consider donating to support the development of Peercoin and this app.
periodic_reminder_backup_body: Keep a backup of your wallet seed in a safe location to avoid losing access to your coins.
receive_website_description: You can purchase Peercoin directly with credit card (non US-customers only) or from various exchanges and services.
receive_website_faucet: You can receive free testnet coins on this faucet.
send_amount_below_minimum:
Minimum output is $amount. 
Please chose an amount greater or equal to it.
send_amount_below_minimum_unable:
Minimum output is $amount. 
You don't have enough funds to pay for the fees.
send_oops: Something went wrong, please try again
server_add_no_wss:
Must start with wss://
Other protocols are currently not supported
server_add_server_wrong_genesis:
Genesis hash does not match.
This server does not support this coin.
server_settings_alert_generated_title: Do you really want to remove this server?
server_settings_alert_hardcoded_content: Hard coded servers can not be deleted, only deactivated.
server_settings_error_no_server_left: At least one connectable server is required!
setup_continue_alert_content:
Make sure you have saved your seed phrase.
You can access it later on in the app settings.
setup_import_note: Please enter the seed you wish to import. This is not to be confused with a private key.
setup_pin: Please set a PIN before you continue.
setup_pin_no_biometrics: Your device does not support biometric authentication.
setup_price_feed_description: This will allow for your wallet balance to be displayed at real time exchange value.
setup_bg_sync_description: This will enable background notifications for your wallets.
setup_securebox_fail:
We are very sorry.
Your device does not support a secure enough way of storing keys.
setup_seed_slider_label: Slide to change the number of words
setup_text1: If you have already created a wallet and you still have your seed phrase, then choose
setup_save_text1: The following word list is called Seed. It is a complex password that will give full access to your wallet and to all your coins.
tx_rejected: Transaction rejected by network. Please try again.
wallet_receive_label_hint: Pressing the Share button will save the address label.
wallet_receive_label_hint_privacy: Reusing your address is discouraged for privacy reasons. If you want to reuse this address, you have to set it to "watched" in the address book after having used it.
wallet_rescan_content:
Scans the wallet again. If you're having trouble with transactions or amounts, this might be helpful.
This might take a moment.
wallet__send_label_hint: Hint: Scanning the QR-Code will save you some time
wallet_scan_notice: This might take a while. Don't close this screen!
secure_storage_body:
Reading from secure storage failed.
Please delete the app data and cache of this application and try again.
wallet_value_alert_content:
Storing this value of coins in a mobile wallet is risky.
Consider moving your coins into Stakebox, Ledger hardware wallet or a cold wallet.
store_description:
Send and receive Peercoin on your phone.

Keep your wallet seed protected. 
This app comes with absolutely no warranty. 
Use at own risk.

Features:
- Based on electrum protocol.
- Send and receive peercoin.
- Ready to transact after installation (no waiting).
- Peercoin and Peercoin testnet wallets.
- Address book management.
- Import paper wallets.
- Import & export private keys (WIF).
- Server management.
- Multi-language support.
- Background notifications.

Known limitations can be found in the Github repository.
store_short: Your mobile wallet for Peercoin and Peercoin testnet.
